name: HttpAdmin
short_description: Generic Database Frontend Tool. Allows user(s) connect to variety of databases that support JDBC technology. Current version of the tool supports 3 Drivers. Oracle thin driver, MySQL Connector J and JDBC ODBC Bridge Driver.
